name: Shattering snow·Frost prison
description: Hammer fueled with power of ice, every Strike will bring shattering flake, even the frozen north can not withstand its power.

name: Shattering snow·Icy phantom
description: Rod that possess the soul of ice Element, ice soul Core gives the rod endless magic power, weapon belong to the legendary icy wizard of Midgard.

name: Shattering snow·Piercing Ice
description: legendary Bow with power of the ice, the freezing power will condense when holding it, release the Bowstring and send the ice shards into victim's heart.

name: Shattering snow·White king's ice blade
description: Weapon of legendary Tundra swordsman White king, blade made of everfrost can maintain absolute zero even in the magical fire, it will freeze anything comes toward its way.

name: Shattering snow·Winter lord
description: Axe born from the ice crystal, possess the devastating power that can split arctic glacier, even demons are afraid of its blood freezing terror.

name: Sheila Hairnet
description: It's a hairband specially made for you to capture your sexual appeal. Men will change their attitude when you wear it.

name: Sheila Hairnet Blueprint
description: It's a hairband specially made for you to capture your sexual appeal. Men will change their attitude when you wear it.

name: Sheila Hairnet [1]
description: It's a hairband specially made for you to capture your sexual appeal. Men will change their attitude when you wear it.

name: Shell
description: It’s not funny to be hit by it. But it’s immense power can only be unleased when it’s fired by some special weapon.

name: Shield of Naga
description: A shield made of Naga's scales, seemingly very hard and meticulous. It may scratch you if you accidentally touch it.
effect: M.Atk ＋8%,For Refining ＋1, Skill multiplier of [Grand Cross] ＋30%

name: Shield of Naga [1]
description: A shield made of Naga's scales, seemingly very hard and meticulous. It may scratch you if you accidentally touch it.
effect: M.Atk ＋8%,For Refining ＋1, Skill multiplier of [Grand Cross] ＋30%

name: Shield [1]
description: Defensive props made of hard metal.

name: Shield [2]
description: A circular shield that is easy and widely used.

name: Shining Baseball Cap [1]
description: A baseball cap with a striking color sure to make you the center of attention. "Well, don't you look like a big shot, now?"
effect: When equipped by Swordsman/Assassin/Priest/Merchant, Atk ＋10,When equipped by wizards, M.Atk ＋10
